title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 700.3 - Statutory time limit for filing an appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 700.3 - Statutory time limit for filing an appeal

State Regulations

To invoke the statutory jurisdiction of the board, all
notices of appeal must be received at the Office of the Commissioner, Department of Correctional Services, Building 2, State Office Campus, Albany, NY 12226 at any time prior to or within 30 days of the time of sale as defined
in section
700.5
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
700.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
